articles.content: Actor-turned-politician Smriti Irani became a household name with the hit show Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi (KSBKBT). Smriti, who played the role of Tulsi Virani, said that she used to get very lit… [+1903 chars]

articles.title: Oscar-Winning Composer Hans Zimmer Collaborates With AR Rahman For Ranbir Kapoor's Ramayana: Report - Times Now
articles.description: Hans Zimmer, two-time Oscar winner known for iconic Hollywood projects like Inception, The Lion King, Dark Knight Trilogy and more, will compose the music of Ranbir Kapoor's Ramayana along with AR Rahman. More details inside!
